definitions.definition: (usually with definite article) Electricity; the electricity supply.
definitions.example: We had to sit in the dark because the electric was cut off.

definitions.definition: A substance or object which can be electrified; an insulator or non-conductor, like amber or glass.
Fencing with the use of a body wire, box, and related equipment to detect when a weapon has touched an opponent.
Of, relating to, produced by, operated with, or utilising electricity; electrical.
Of or relating to an electronic version of a musical instrument that has an acoustic equivalent.
